orders, which both

er has failed
to deliver so the buyer wants to cancel the first order.  Cor=
rect?

n
suggested, stuff happens...

d seller may need to make
good.  If the first order had a cancellation fee,=
 the buyer may need
to pay it.  And the first seller may lose some resource=
